dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM as the root cause of the VCORE increase.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The agent captured the main causal link but missed some details about the DDR and CPU contributions.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified the VCORE usage percentage but missed specific DDR and CPU frequency metrics.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning was logical and correctly ruled out MMDVFS as a cause.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fixes are practical and relevant, focusing on CM and CPU adjustments.
